sentences.sContent: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.sContent_eng: She wrote hymns to the gods in cuneiform.
sentences.sCn: 她用楔形文字写下了献给神祇的颂歌。

sentences.sContent: A 1913 statute, still on the books, sought to thwart propaganda by forbidding the hiring of "publicity experts, " a ban that has as much to do with modern communication as cuneiform tablets.
sentences.sContent_eng: A 1913 statute, still on the books, sought to thwart propaganda by forbidding the hiring of "publicity experts, " a ban that has as much to do with modern communication as cuneiform tablets.
sentences.sCn: 一项1913年颁布、至今有效的法律旨在通过禁止雇用“公关专家”来阻止宣传，这道禁令涵盖的是从现代通讯到楔形文字泥板的一切。

synos.tran: [解剖][生物]楔形的；楔形文字的；楔状骨的

trans.tranCn: 〔古代美索不达米亚人使用的〕楔形文字的
trans.tranOther: relating to the writing used by the people of ancient Mesopotamia
